name: ShowBiz Project File
summary: Learn about .SBZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You can add video, images, and audio to your ShowBiz project and add transitions and special effects. The SBZ project file allows you to close the project and edit it at a later time.
NOTE: ShowBiz 5 was the last version of the software released. It is no longer maintained or updated.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
